title: Refactor React (Vite) marketing UI into pages/components/sections without UI changes

requirements.summary: Restructure frontend source tree into pages/components/sections by moving existing marketing components and updating imports only (no UI/behavior changes).
acceptanceCriteria: Existing section components are relocated into `frontend/src/sections/` and still export the same default components with identical JSX, styles, animations, and content.
`Navbar` and `Footer` are relocated under `frontend/src/components/` with no UI/behavior changes.

Any shared helper/components currently under `frontend/src/components/marketing/` that are imported by sections (e.g., `MotionHeading`, `MotionReveal`, `CodeBlockWithCopy`, `scroll`) are moved under `frontend/src/components/` (or an appropriate subfolder) and all consuming imports are updated accordingly.
Frontend builds successfully after the restructure (no missing module/import errors).

file_operations.description: Move Navbar into the new components folder without changing logic, styles, content, or behavior.
Move Footer into the new components folder without changing logic, styles, content, or behavior.
Move MotionHeading into `frontend/src/components/` (or appropriate subfolder) without changing JSX/behavior; update downstream imports accordingly.
Move MotionReveal into `frontend/src/components/` (or appropriate subfolder) without changing JSX/behavior; update downstream imports accordingly.
Move CodeBlockWithCopy into `frontend/src/components/` (or appropriate subfolder) without changing JSX/behavior; update downstream imports accordingly.
Move the smooth-scroll utility into `frontend/src/components/` (or appropriate subfolder) without changing behavior; update downstream imports accordingly.
Move Hero section component into `frontend/src/sections/` (e.g., `Hero.tsx`) with no markup/style/animation/content changes; update imports only.
Move About section component into `frontend/src/sections/` (e.g., `About.tsx`) with no markup/style/animation/content changes; update imports only.
Move Services section component into `frontend/src/sections/` (e.g., `Services.tsx`) with no markup/style/animation/content changes; update imports only.
Move Works section component into `frontend/src/sections/` (e.g., `Works.tsx`) with no markup/style/animation/content changes; update imports only.
Move GetCode section component into `frontend/src/sections/` (e.g., `GetCode.tsx`) with no markup/style/animation/content changes; update imports only.
Move Contact section component into `frontend/src/sections/` (e.g., `Contact.tsx`) with no markup/style/animation/content changes; update imports only.
After moving, update Navbar's internal import(s) to the relocated smooth-scroll utility (path-only change) and ensure the generated asset references remain unchanged.
After moving, update Hero section imports to the relocated smooth-scroll utility (path-only change) while preserving IDs, tabIndex, styles, animations, and generated asset references.
After moving, update About section imports to the relocated shared components (MotionHeading/MotionReveal) with path-only changes; keep markup/styles/animations/content identical.
After moving, update Services section imports to the relocated shared components (MotionHeading/MotionReveal) with path-only changes; keep markup/styles/animations/content identical.
After moving, update Works section imports to the relocated shared components (MotionHeading/MotionReveal) with path-only changes; keep markup/styles/animations/content identical.
After moving, update GetCode section imports to the relocated shared components (MotionHeading/MotionReveal/CodeBlockWithCopy) with path-only changes; keep markup/styles/animations/content identical.
After moving, update Contact section imports to the relocated shared components (MotionHeading/MotionReveal) with path-only changes; keep markup/styles/animations/content identical.

requirements.summary: Create HomePage page that composes the relocated sections in the exact required order without changing section internals.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` exists and exports a React component.
`HomePage` renders the existing sections in the exact order: Hero, About, Services, Works, GetCode, Contact.
No visual/behavioral changes occur within sections as a result of using `HomePage` (only imports/composition change).

file_operations.description: Create HomePage that imports the moved section components from `frontend/src/sections/` and renders them in this exact order: Hero → About → Services → Works → GetCode → Contact, with composition-only changes.

requirements.summary: Update App to render Navbar, HomePage, Footer while keeping the existing wrapper structure/classes unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: `App.tsx` renders `<Navbar />`, then `<HomePage />`, then `<Footer />` within the same top-level wrapper/classes currently used.
The rendered UI matches the pre-refactor UI (no content/styling/animation changes).

file_operations.description: Replace direct section imports with `Navbar` (from `frontend/src/components/`), `HomePage` (from `frontend/src/pages/`), and `Footer` (from `frontend/src/components/`), preserving the existing top-level wrapper and classes exactly.

requirements.summary: Preserve section IDs and smooth-scroll navigation behavior after refactor (including focus management and reduced-motion behavior).
acceptanceCriteria: Each section still renders with the same `id` attribute values as before (e.g., `id="home"`, `id="about"`, `id="services"`, `id="works"`, `id="get-code"`, `id="contact"`).
`Navbar` item clicks still call the same scrolling utility and result in smooth scrolling (unless user prefers reduced motion) with the same offset behavior.
After scrolling, the destination section receives focus as before (accessibility behavior preserved).

file_operations.description: Ensure the moved scroll utility remains behavior-identical (offset, reduced-motion handling, and focus management) and is exported with the same API used by Navbar/Hero.
Ensure Navbar continues to call the relocated scroll utility for `home`, `about`, `services`, `works`, `get-code`, and `contact` with identical behavior (path-only import updates).
Ensure Hero section still uses `id="home"` and invokes the relocated scroll utility for the CTA (path-only import updates; preserve tabIndex and markup).
Verify About section retains `id="about"` and `tabIndex` exactly; apply only import path updates resulting from file moves.
Verify Services section retains `id="services"` and `tabIndex` exactly; apply only import path updates resulting from file moves.
Verify Works section retains `id="works"` and `tabIndex` exactly; apply only import path updates resulting from file moves.
Verify GetCode section retains `id="get-code"` exactly; apply only import path updates resulting from file moves.
Verify Contact section retains `id="contact"` and `tabIndex` exactly; apply only import path updates resulting from file moves.

acceptanceCriteria: The output includes full updated contents for every file that changes path or content as part of the refactor (not just diffs).
All updated contents reflect import path changes required by the new folder structure.
No unintended text/content changes are introduced in the moved components beyond import path updates.
